actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating May 8 of each year as Harry S. Truman Day.

summary.text: Designates May 8 of each year as "Harry S. Truman Day", and authorizes the President to issue a proclamation calling for the observance of such day with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating May 8 of each year as Harry S. Truman Day.
